DESCRIPTION: If Mood gets to #b4 or more, gain a random #yInspiration, which is a powerful positive one-time effect, and then lose #b4 Mood.
If Mood gets to #b-4 or below, gain a random #yMental #yBreak, which gives #b2 #yStatuses based on its type, then gain #b4 Mood.
Gain #b2 random #yStatus cards based on the type of break.
